titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Brian Carpenter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:12-0400

did.unittitle: Iroqouis material
did.physdesc: 14 sound discs (2 hr., 20 min.) : analog, 78 rpm ; 12 in.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by William Fenton in 1990. The records are copies made at the Library of Congress from original field recordings made on a Presto Disk Recorder.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material has access restritions. Please consult a curator for details.

did.unittitle: Audio recordings
Test strip with Snipe Song

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Phonograph record) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.
